page.title: 01LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content:
OUR VILLAGE
Llanfechain is a small village in North Wales (Mid Wales). St Garmons church in the centre of our village, and most of the houses are grouped around it.There are two chaples, Apost office and a village shop,a village hall, and a public house (pub). It has a population of 317 on the electoral roll with 38 children of school age, and other main buildings include a school. The surrounding area is all farmland.The people in the main travel to work in Llanfyllin, Oswestry and Welshpool.This year 9 new private houses are being built at the Mount (Domen Gastell)
